titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain flame retardant plasticizers.
To suspend temporarily the duty on certain flame retardant plasticizers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on certain flame retardant plasticizers (Diphenyl cresyl phosphate) and (Phosphoric Acid, tris (2-ethylhexyl) ester).
